channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road surface crumbling around road drain lid in driving area of road, 25th January
item.description:
We have seen heavier vehicles in our road lately & we noticed the area around the drain had crumbled Saturday 24th

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Ringshall Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Rocking, 25th January

item.title: A permanent puddles come rain or sun, 25th January
item.description:
The dropped kerb is full of debris and mud. In dry weather it becomes a rough mud patch, and in wet weather it turns into a large puddle. As a result, pushchairs and wheelchairs cannot use the dropped kerb at any time. This makes the crossing inaccessible and unsafe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, Patterson Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
